snippet: This year’s festival had abundant options and polarities playing out on five stages.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews electronic dance music performances at seventh annual Electric Zoo festival on Randalls Island.
lead_paragraph: This year’s festival had abundant options and polarities playing out on five stages.

headline.main: Review: Electric Zoo, a Menagerie Designed for Dancing
headline.print_headline: An Electronic Menagerie Designed for Dancing
